timeAnchors.sourceText: The accumulation period refers to time from initiation of ALXN1840 (Day 1) to expected steady state at Day 10, based on 5 times the half-life of 2 days.

The study title is 'A Phase 2, Open-label Study to Assess Copper and Molybdenum Balance', which implies a continuous collection of samples over a defined period to measure net balance.
The protocol amendment summary states that some sites may 'only perform screening procedures', indicating these are one-time activities to determine eligibility.

footnoteConditions.text:
Overall Rationale for the Amendment 
The main reason for preparation of this amendment was to clarify study procedures occurring 
across different sites in the US, so as to facilitate participant recruitment across different regions 
of the US, and to lessen inconvenience for participants without compromising the quality of the 
study

endpointAlgorithms.name: Net Negative Copper Balance

timeWindow.reference: During daily repeat-dose ALXN1840 treatment period

endpointAlgorithms.algorithm: Net Copper Balance = Copper Intake - Copper Output
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: The primary objective of this study is to demonstrate a net negative copper balance with daily repeat-dose ALXN1840 treatment (15 mg and 30 mg) in participants with WD.

derivedVariables.name: Mean daily copper balance
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Calculated difference between copper intake (in food and drink) and copper output (in feces and urine), averaged over the analysis period.
derivedVariables.analysisWindow: ALXN1840 accumulation and steady-state periods for each dose

derivedVariables.name: Change in mean daily copper balance from baseline
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Mean daily copper balance during treatment period - Mean daily copper balance at baseline
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Mean daily copper balance measured during the pretreatment period.
derivedVariables.analysisWindow: ALXN1840 accumulation and steady-state periods for each dose

derivedVariables.name: Mean daily molybdenum balance
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Calculated difference between molybdenum intake (in food, drink and ALXN1840) and molybdenum output (in feces and urine), averaged over the analysis period.

derivedVariables.name: Change from predose in ceruloplasmin
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Value at post-dose timepoint - Value at predose
